input.sentences: friends assembling on an out door trip .
the architecture was stunning in the city center .
we enjoyed a rest at a book store .
we then went back to the beach to take in the view .
there was many interesting natural items to observe .
output.sentences: This year I took a trip with my next door friends.
We walked around and saw this stunning city center.
We visited and enjoyed a lot of stores.
We headed over to get a better view of the beach.
While at the beach we took time to observe the natural items the waves brought in.
